title: The Greg Miller Pangaea Timeline - Kinda Funny Doodles
description:
New episode of Kinda Funny Doodles every Friday!

transcript_chunks.text: Colin: Who's your favorite Germanic... horde? Greg: Oh man! There's just, there's so many of 'em I always thought... that The River Raid Gang was a real tough horde (Kevin's angelic laugh) Colin: What year was that? Greg: That was roughly 1862. Colin: Oh there were still these - - Greg: Oh yeah! Colin: Oh I didn't - - Greg: You don't even know how these work You figure, Pangaea had just split up Colin: And what was Pangaea? Greg: Pangaea, of course, was all the, or, where all the continents are now, they used to be all one big mess. Colin: Right, right Greg: And then, roughly 1765 Colin: Right. Greg: They start separating.

Colin: Right, right Greg: And then, roughly 1765 Colin: Right. Greg: They start separating. Colin: Interesting. Greg: Then, of course, the buffalo Colin: What about the buffalo, what did they do? Greg: They were in trouble, right? When the Pangaea Crisis happened You might say, well, then how did people get around this? You know what I mean? How did people choose, like, you know, mothers and babies and calculators, they wanna get to... where the people are. How're they gonna get there? Right? So, I'm a human being and I wanna come over to Africa from North America and what I would do is go like this with the rope And do one of these And you'd pull yourself across Right, you know what I'm talking about?

Colin: Right. Greg: You know what I'm talking about - And the buffalo are just like, "What?!" "WHAT?!" And they just can't do it. Colin: Mmm. I didn't know that, that's not what I learned from Northeastern. Greg: Oh, well Not surprising that Northeastern wouldn't teach you about that. Colin: No. No, Northeastern wouldn't teach me about that. Are you done? Greg: Yeah. I'm done.
